website_summaries.verdict: One of the easiest to operate, as it pairs with your phone with a seamless app. One of few effective translators that is priced below $100.
pros: Device listens and translates both the audio and text of the language in your app, so you can also learn while you’re traveling
Supports languages in over 40 countries and receives high marks for use in Spanish-speaking countries
cons: Bit of a learning curve with the app, which has some features that could be improved for user experience and overall clarity

customer_reviews.title: great offline translator
customer_reviews.text: YES! We can. I know Spanish but my wife does not. This alleviates my burden of teaching her. It works well. We occasionally need to speak with a friend who is French and does not speak English well. No problem now. Can't wait to meet a Chinese person. My wife can converse with a Spanish person with a satisfactory degree of spontaneity. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Great Translator
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this translator to help me communicate with my in-laws who are visiting from Ecuador. They only speak and understand Spanish and I can’t speak Spanish at all. This device removed this communication barrier for us and this has made their visit so much more comfortable and fun. I use it to translate my English to Spanish and they use it translate from Spanish to English. Its easy to use, reliable and makes communicating in other languages fun. I recommend this product to anyone needing to overcome the problems that communication barriers create.
